item.title: About
item.description: I am a self-taught polyglot programming with experience in multiple languages included C#, python, Java, ruby, golang and rust. Currently I’m a security consultant for Depth Security and have assisted with the CTF for BSidesKC for the past three years. As an employee of Depth I help maintain several projects including armory, which was created to automate and assist with running multiple tools against targets and gathering the information within a database to easily create reports.
